title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems this is inred text.
OB: choose the project name to be 'test'.notice that a static text validation error appears on the dialog.
EB: if i uncheck the default location checkbox, the default location shouldremain in the edit box (it should not clear it). it should be black text, and include the standard ontheflyvalidation small error icon.
SR: clean f2:create a single project, say 'test'.copy, paste.on the 'copy project' dialog:1. with use default location checked, i should still be able to select to viewor copy the default location from the edit box below.2. perhaps i want to choose apath close to the default location.3.
